title: As Ukraine Makes Gains, Mykolaiv Bears Fierce Russian Attacks
description: The Ukrainian city keeps getting bombed by the Russians just as nearby Kherson appears to be falling back into the hands of Ukraine.
dc:creator: Jeffrey Gettleman
media:credit: Finbarr O'Reilly for The New York Times
media:description: An apartment block in the Ukrainian city of Mykolaiv that was damaged overnight by Russian bombardment, killing at least seven people.
